taskDescription: How would you use the reaction of an amide with LiAlH4 as the key step in going from bromocyclohexane to (N,N-dimethylaminomethyl)cyclohexane? Write all the steps in the reaction sequence.
detailedSolution: 1. Mg; 2. CO2, then H3O+; 3. SOCl2; 4. (CH3)2NH; 5. LiAlH4
